name: Food Chain (itch) (soeyzandiego)
description:
Submission to Godot Wild Jam #41 ("Ocean")

Move your way up the food chain and become the predator.

[HOW TO PLAY]

Aim your fish by pointing your mouse in the direction you want to move.

Hold Left Mouse Button to move forward. Your fish will stop if you let go of LMB.

Start by eating creatures smaller than you.

The bar at the top of the screen represents your Growth Bar. Once your bar is filled, your fish will evolve and consequently become bigger and faster. 

Eat the biggest prey possible by the end of the timer!

[Known Bugs]
  • Player can go out of bounds
